entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
